title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with a large building in the background.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving straight on a city street with a large building in the background.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.4 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is a one-way street with two lanes. There are several cars and a parked truck on the side of the road. The traffic light is green and there is a crosswalk in the distance. The weather is clear and sunny.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is maintaining a moderate speed and staying in the right lane. It is keeping a safe distance from the parked truck and other cars on the road.
